    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CheckinCommand
    Handles the interactive logic for checking a guest into a room.
    CheckoutCommand
    Handles the interactive logic for checking a guest out of a room.
    Command
    Abstract base class for all commands in the system, implementing the Strategy Pattern.
    CommandConstants
    Utility class holding shared constants for command-related operations, such as default filenames.
    CommandCreationException
    Thrown when a command class exists but cannot be instantiated (e.g. due to constructor failure or visibility issues).
    CommandName
    Annotation used to mark a Command class with its invocation name (e.g., "checkin").
    CommandRegistry
    A factory class that discovers, registers, and creates command instances.
    ConsoleFormatter
    A utility class for printing formatted output to the console, such as tables, headers, and properties.
    Guest
    Represents a hotel guest with a name.
    Hotel
    Represents the entire hotel, managing all rooms, reservations, and data persistence (loading/saving to CSV).
    HotelApplication
    Main entry point for the Hotel Management System.
    HotelDataException
    Thrown when there is an error reading or writing persistent hotel data, for example from a CSV file.
    InteractiveCommand
    An interface for commands that require interactive input from the user.
    InvalidCommandException
    Thrown when a requested command is not registered in the system.
    ListCommand
    Handles the logic for listing all rooms in the hotel, showing their status, main guest, and reservation dates.
    LoadCommand
    Handles the interactive logic for loading the hotel state from a CSV file.
    Map<K,V>
     
    MyMap<K,V>
    An AVL-Tree-based implementation of the Map interface.
    PricesCommand
    Handles the logic for displaying a list of all rooms and their prices per night.
    Reservation
    Represents a reservation for a hotel room.
    Room
    Represents a single hotel room, managing its price, capacity, and current reservation state.
    RoomFreeException
    Thrown when an operation (like checkout) is attempted on a room that is already free.
    RoomNotFoundException
    Thrown when an operation is attempted on a room number that does not exist in the hotel.
    RoomOccupiedException
    Thrown when an operation (like check-in) is attempted on a room that is already occupied.
    RoomSmallCapacityException
    Thrown when a check-in is attempted with more guests than the room's capacity allows.
    SaveCommand
    Handles the interactive logic for saving the current hotel state to a CSV file.
    ViewCommand
    Handles the interactive logic for viewing detailed information about a single room.
